name: CRUNCH (itch)
description:
This game is a simple abstract game where you squish cubes. If too many cubes touch your circle, you're dead and have to start over. Crunch cubes, get points, be a bad ass cube cruncher.

I focused most of this game on "feel". So I added a bunch of stuff that "feels" right. Like camera shakes, numbers that count up, blood and gore, the usual fun things.

And boosh! I have a build up. I need to re-install Unity on my main PC, apparently.
